message.body: Won't be at the pool for a few days. My bike and I got into a disagreement with an SUV this morning. I'm mostly ok but I have a few too many scrapes for the pool right now :-\
Oh no! Do u need anything? I could drop you off dinner or a cookie from ###############
Aww, thanks :-) I'm good. I appreciate it though! Hope to be back in the pool by next week
I hope so too! Seriously, let me know if u need anything. Was the driver of the SUV helpful?
She was pretty hysterical. I was mostly trying to calm HER down. A few other people stopped to help though
